idea-plugin.name: BigClean Scanner
idea-plugin.description:
BigClean Scanner - Code Cleanup Analysis Tool

A powerful IntelliJ IDEA plugin for analyzing unused code in your projects, helping developers clean and maintain their codebase. This tool provides comprehensive analysis capabilities to identify and remove dead code, improving code quality and maintainability.

Key Features:

  • Unused Class Analysis - Uses two different analysis methods to identify unused classes
  • Regex Analysis - Fast scanning, suitable for preliminary analysis
  • Spoon AST Analysis - Precise syntax analysis providing more accurate results
  • Unused Method Analysis - Identifies methods that are not called in the project
  • Independent Refresh - Each analysis module can be refreshed independently
  • Spring Framework Support - Optimized analysis specifically for Spring projects

How to Use:

  1. Find "BigClean Scanner" in the right tool window
  2. Select the project to analyze
  3. Click the corresponding refresh button to start analysis
  4. Review analysis results and clean up unused code

Supported Analysis Types:

  • Spring @Component, @Service, @Repository, @Controller
  • AspectJ @Aspect annotations
  • MapStruct @Mapper annotations
  • Lombok annotation classes
  • JUnit test classes
  • Configuration property classes

Note: Analysis results are for reference only. Please verify carefully before actually deleting code.
